text:
Blood Bath Is About To Begin & These Latest Pics Of Game Of Thrones Show Jon Snow Is Terrified!
Blood Bath Is About To Begin & These Latest Pics Of Game Of Thrones Show Jon Snow Is Terrified!
As the finale of Game of Thrones is inching closer, the fans are waiting for big battle at the Winterfell, which will decide the fate of who will die and who will survive.
If you didn’t know already, the third episode of Game of Thrones season 8 episode 3 is going to be the longest one fans have ever seen. It will be 82 minutes long. It took 55 nights to film this episode. It will mark the beginning of the bloodiest finale battle at the Winterfell.
Ahead of episode 3, HBO has released some pictures from Game of Thrones to whet the appetite of fans. And to be honest, seeing Jon Snow so terrified, we are shitting bricks!
#1 Looks Like Daenerys and Jon are set for a dragon ride.
HBO
Don't Miss 159 SHARES 842 SHARES
#2 Why is Jon Snow so terrified?
HBO
#3 Jaime and Ser Brienne of Tarth are ready to fight the white walkers.
HBO
#4 Are Lord Varys and Tyrion Lannister strategising against Night King?
HBO
#5 Sansa and Arya share a horrified moment together. Did Arya just tell her about last night with Gendry?
#6 What’s up with Sansa here?
HBO
Winter has arrived!
title: Blood Bath Is About To Begin & These Latest Pics Of Game Of Thrones Show Jon Snow Is Terrified!
